import s from './StylePizzaOrder/PizzaOrder.module.css' import React from "react"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import LastSeenContainer from "../../LaterSeen/LastSeenContainer"; class AllOrder extends React.Component { state = { sneks: { photoURL: this.props.sneks[this.props.number - 19].photoURL, name: this.props.sneks[this.props.number - 19].name, structure: this.props.sneks[this.props.number - 19].structure, cost: this.props.sneks[this.props.number - 19].cost, }, sous: { photoURL: this.props.sous[this.props.number - 32].photoURL, name: this.props.sous[this.props.number - 32].name, structure: this.props.sous[this.props.number - 32].structure, cost: this.props.sous[this.props.number - 32].cost, }, drink: { photoURL: this.props.drink[this.props.number - 14].photoURL, name: this.props.drink[this.props.number - 14].name, structure: this.props.drink[this.props.number - 14].structure, cost: this.props.drink[this.props.number - 14].cost, }, pizza: { photoURL: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].photoURL, name: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].name, structure: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].structure, }, size: this.props.size, cost: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost, ves: this.props.ves, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no } NewSize28 = () => { this.setState({ size: 28, cost: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost, ves: 370, style_line28: s.line28, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no }) } NewSize33 = () => { if (this.state.cost < this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost * 3 || this.state.cost > this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost * 2.6) { this.setState({ size: 33, cost: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost * 2.7, ves: 580, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.line33, style_line45: s.no }) } } NewSize45 = () => { if (this.state.cost <= this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost * 4) { this.setState({ size: 45, cost: this.props.pizza[this.props.number - 1].cost * 4, ves: 1240, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.line45 }) } } render() { let item if (this.props.number < 13) { item =
Меню/ Пица/ {this.state.pizza.name}
{this.state.pizza.name}
{Math.round(this.state.cost)} грн
{this.state.pizza.structure}
Вага: {this.state.ves}
Розмір піци: {this.state.size}
28 см
_______
33 см
_______
45 см
_______
} else if (this.props.number >= 14 && this.props.number < 19) { item =
Меню/ Напитки/ {this.state.drink.name}
{this.state.drink.name}
{Math.round(this.state.drink.cost)} грн
{this.state.drink.structure}
} else if (this.props.number >= 19 && this.props.number < 32) { item =
Меню/Cнеки/ {this.state.sneks.name}
{this.state.sneks.name}
{Math.round(this.state.sneks.cost)} грн
{this.state.sneks.structure}
} else if (this.props.number >= 32 && this.props.number < 40) { item =
Меню/ Соуси/ {this.state.sous.name}
{this.state.sous.name}
{Math.round(this.state.sous.cost)} грн
{this.state.sous.structure}
} return (
{item}
) } } export default AllOrder
